name: bj-clex
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe), wcel(cima(c0, c2), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cima(c0, c2), universe), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cima(c0, c2), universe), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cima(c0, c2), universe), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cima(c0, c2), universe), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))
-| diffsc(s0, cima(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))
-| diffsc(s0, cima(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- diffsc(s0, cima(c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cima(c0, c2))), universe))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Sethood of certain classes. (Contributed by BJ, 2-Apr-2019.)
